Reviews.Content: stayed hotel november 2011 persons paid amount stay unfairly 142 pounds bank account informed hotel management immediately pay money 4 months answering emails hotel poor terms management service ignorant disrespectful sue company

Reviews.Content: recently stayed admiral 143 sussex gardens comment sister hotel kingsway park reception hotels inviting staff extremely welcoming found admiral value minutes paddington station hotel located pedestrian frontage main road means enjoys quiet location little street noise manager hotels kin excellent friendly welcoming professional helpful deserves accolades charming manages busy hotel operation split multiple buildings enormous asset business consummate hotel professional star businesses admirals clean tastefully decorated modern facilities acceptable standard ground floor bar breakfast boutique hotel easily charge 2 times price design concept breakfast service perfect drawback admiral lift upper stair floors bit narrow difficult guests challenges heavy luggage main reception kingsway storage welcome lounge comfy couches travellers easily leave main luggage heavy luggage upper floors summary location management excellent hotel offers value money 20 coming short stays london admiral seen recently care manager kin persuaded stay soon

Reviews.Title: “friendly staff and good location”

Reviews.Content: reading reviews trip advisor bit worried hotel nice clean breakfast excellent staff kin manager helpful polite rest staff reception cleaned day recommend hotel location perfect
